name: Garlic Kale Quinoa
author: Melanie
summary: Great for a quick-but-healthy side dish. White cooking wine can be used instead of 1 tablespoon water at the end of cooking.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring 2/3 cup water and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender and water has been absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; saute kale and garlic in the hot oil until kale is wilted, about 5 minutes
Stir quinoa into kale mixture and add sesame oil; cook until flavors blend, about 5 more minutes
Add 1 tablespoon water to mixture to keep from sticking
